title: Digital Storytelling Production Workshop: Language Expression Enhancement Using Smartphones and VR

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Smartphone Operation Skills and Digital Content Consumption Experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on creative expression training in limited technological environments. Practice-oriented operation utilizing VR simulations and smartphone apps

learning_goals: Learners can produce 3-5 minute digital storytelling content via smartphone within four weeks
Learners can construct linguistic expressions by utilizing a storytelling structure (introduction-development-crisis-conclusion).
Learners demonstrate collaborative skills by sharing stories created in a VR environment with peer learners and exchanging feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
